body_html: Worked for me as well with @Mistobaan 's instructions. Note that coreutils has to be installed from brew even if you think it's already installed, because the installer calls greadlink, so the brew package is a hard dependency on OS X. In addition, there should be a better way of handling the LD_LIBRARY_PATH issue. Setting any of those environment variables manually can wreak all sorts of havok on OS X. Neither theano nor torch needs it set explicitly.

Neither theano nor torch needs it set explicitly.
body: Worked for me as well with @Mistobaan 's instructions.  Note that `coreutils` has to be installed from brew even if you think it's already installed, because the installer calls `greadlink`, so the brew package is a hard dependency on OS X.  In addition, there should be a better way of handling the `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` issue.  Setting any of those environment variables manually can wreak all sorts of havok on OS X.  Neither theano nor torch needs it set explicitly.
